OOC: It hink that it is over


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::The Protectrons/Torca/Sky Lynx/Sideswipe/Ratchet:::
> 
> ::Chromedome got hit by the sonic blast::
> ~~~~~
> ::Highbrow dodged the grenade, got hit by one fusion blast::
> ~~~~~
> ::Hardhead was hit by all the optics::
> ~~~~~
> ::Brainstorm was hit by a dozen of the rounds, but his armor is 
holding out 
> so far::
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca destroyes the missles, got hit by one stinger missle, and 
the 
> sharpnel from the grenade and 10 bolts::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sky Lynx destroys the missles, got hit by 2 blasts, all the optic 
blasts, 
> and dodged most of the rounds::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe gets hit by 2 stinger missle, dodges the hypersonic 
blasts::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ratchet gets hit by the optic blasts::
> ~~~~~
> ::They all get Iron Raptor's transmission and run to her position::
> Chromedome: You must be Iron Raptor. Im Chromedome, leader of the 
> Protectrons. The Maximal Elders sent us here to help you.
> ::He looks around::
> Chromedome: And it looks like you need a lot of help.
